EmailTemplate.description: Notifies proposal review user that the PR has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: ANZ Proposal Review Approval Notification - English
EmailTemplate.subject: GNG for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c} has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.ANZ_Approver__c} has approved the 'Proposal Review' decision for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c} for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Account__c}.
The proposal review (why go) record can be accessed here: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link} or via the related opportunity record.
